reviewText: I wanted to show this to my Spanish class, but there is a scene in it where the kids are masterbating.  Otherwise it deals with childhood cancer and how these boys live with it.  Nice movie, not good for high school.

This quality of the digital transfer was a bit sub-par. My copy was simply a poor transfer and it as distracting, at times, to see pixels flashing around the screen while trying to read the subtitles. The storyline was reasonably entertaining. I found the story a tad flat.
